title: Plot Raster Images Interactively on a Plain HTML Canvas — plainview-package
text: Provides methods plotting potentially large (raster) images interactively plain HTML canvas. Supports plotting RasterLayer, RasterStack, RasterBrick (package raster) well png files located disk. Interactivity includes zooming, panning, mouse location information. case multi-layer RasterStacks RasterBricks, RBG image plots created (similar raster::plotRGB - interactive).
